refnamediv.refpurpose: display information about finite state automata files

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: fsainfo displays information about fsa files, mainly based on the fsa header. In addition, fsainfo tries to load the fsa file and reports whether loading succeeded. The following information is presented:

listitem.para: Size of the fsa header (usually 256 bytes).
Magic number identifying fsa files (2038637673). Files with wrong magic will not be attempted to load.
Version of the fsa library used for building the fsa file (e.g. 1.0.2).
Serial number of the fsa file.
Checksum for verifying the integrity of the fsa file. If the checksum verification fails, the fsa file will refuse to load.
Size of the automaton (in number of cells and bytes).
Size of data storage used for storing meta information for final states.
Type of meta data items (fixed or variable size).
Size of meta data items, if fixed size.
Indication whether the fsa was built with perfect hash (yes/no).
Perfect hash size, if the fsa was built with perfect hash.
Full size of the fsa file (header + automaton + meta data + perfect hash).
